question:
Consider the following Reports:
  1. Annual Report of the Public Accounts Committee
  2. Annual Report of Union Public Service Commission
  3. Annual Report of National Commission for Scheduled Castes
Which of the above is/are laid in the Parliament by the President?
explanation: Annual report of Public Account Committee is not presented by President in the Parliament. The Committee examines the Appropriation Accounts relating to the Railways, Defence Services, P&T Department and other Civil Ministries of the Government of India and Reports of the Comptroller and Auditor-General of India.
